name: Chaotic Highway
description:
Welcome to a Highway that is Full of Chaotic Content! Drive your Armored Green Lamborghini down a Road with Carnage to Destroy You!!! Can you Survive (and Shoot) your Way Though It???

This Game is my 3rd PC Game that I've made with my Neighbor (https://itch.io/profile/multi-core-collider) on August 13, 2018! It's Going to be CHAOTIC, if you Play it!!!

Basically, "Chaotic Highway" is a Top-Down Scrolling, Action, Shooter, Fast-Paced, and Strategy Game for all Players! You're in a Armed Green Lamborghini with the Skill to Shoot, Enable a Nifty Shield (while not Shooting), Collect Useful Power-Ups from Exploded/Dead Enemies, and Trigger Powerful Nuclear Bombs to Destroy Enemies during your Chaotic Ride on the Road!

The Enemies: Small TNT Barrels, Medium TNT Barrels, Large TNT Barrels, Small and Big Red Trucks with Guys Shooting Cannons, and a SURPRISING Blue Helicopter for the BOSS!

Destroy the Enemies, Cause Chaos, Earn Points, Collect Power-Ups (Before they Fade Away), and Survive the Insane Havoc on the Highway!!!

If you have ANY Question on anything on my Game (Power-Ups, Thoughts, Gameplay, etc.), Comment them Below! Thanks and Enjoy! If you want, make Videos on your Gameplay(s) and Upload them on YouTube for your Support!

P.S. The YouTube Link will NOT Be Active, if you Hit Space at the Main Menu, because it's Terminated and No Longer on YouTube! But my channel is linked for the Trailer Link for this Game! (Jay BirdBlu_117)
